data Box a = Box {
  • unBox :: a
}

display_html: data Stream m a = forall s. Stream (s -> m (Step s a)) s
name: Stream Stream

display_html:
data Step s a where
  • Yield :: a -> s -> Step s a
  • Skip :: s -> Step s a
  • Done :: Step s a
name: Step Yield Skip Done

display_html:
data SPEC
  • = SPEC
  • | SPEC2
name: SPEC SPEC SPEC2
